properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nitakushukuru mwenyezi,
nitakuhimidi nitakutukuza
ee-Bwana,
kwa kuwa u-mwema. x2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Nitalisifu jina lako,
ewe, Bwana
nitaziimba sifa zako milele,
kwa kuwa u- mwema. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nalipokutafuta Bwana,
sikudhani kwamba unaishi
ndani ya watu,
nasio angani. x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hivyo umenifumbulia,
shetani muongo anielezapo
ya kwamba,
wee Mungu haupo. x2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Basi nakupa moyo wangu,
njoo Bwana mwokozi
jitengenezee nafasi,
uishi milele. x2
